root.name: The Pagemaster
root.description: OverviewThe Pagemaster was a 1994 game based on the movie of the same name. In the game players must play as a virtual Macaulay Culkin, who must make his way through three worlds each consisting several levels and each based on a different literary genre. (Horror, Adventure and Fantasy.) Along with several collectables completists can look to collect a library card in each level. For a kids game the game was fairly challenging due in part to your character loosing a life if he's hit unless you collect an item in which case he looses that. The PC version of the game is completely different; it is an point and click adventure game that has a plot unrelated to that of the movie.
